content: this is the pattern for my adorable turkey hat available in several sizes it is the perfect photo prop for fall and thanksgiving this pattern is written in us terms this pattern begins with a magic_ring or magic_ring if you are not familiar with this technique there are great tutorials online sizing will vary depending on how tightly or loosely you crochet please check your gauge before starting this project materials needed size h 5 0mm crochet hook size i 5 5mm crochet hook size j 6 0mm crochet hook worsted weight yarn i use lily sugar and cream cotton yarn stitch marker tapestry needle for weaving ends 2 3/4 buttons needle and thread
